EmailTemplate.description: Subject: Thank You for Submitting Your Registration with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.name: Alliance Reg Partner Confirmation Email v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Submitting Your Registration with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Alliance_Registration__c.Partner_First_Name_Capitalized__c},
We have received your registration with {!Alliance_Registration__c.Customer_Account_Name__c} and will review it within 2 business days.
As a next step, you will receive an email with details of your Turbonomic counterparts – sales manager and sales rep. From there, an opportunity review call will be setup within 1 week where we will all agree to next steps and either approve or deny the registration.
Please do not reply to this email. If you have questions, reach out to any of the following: sean.casey@turbobnomic.com – VP of Alliances justin.kutticherry@turbonomic.com – Alliance Manager Charles_Geisler@bmc.com – Business Development Manager
Regards, The Turbo Team
